languages.text: "Вид Корпораптор хоминис. Обладают высокими способностями к инфильтрации, адаптивны, высокоорганизованы, обладают развитым интеллектом. Замечены в паразитарном заражении особей иных видов с последующей перестройкой генетической структуры носителя".

"Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."
languages.original_text: "Вид Корпораптор хоминис. Обладают высокими способностями к инфильтрации, адаптивны, высокоорганизованы, обладают развитым интеллектом. Замечены в паразитарном заражении особей иных видов с последующей перестройкой генетической структуры носителя".

traits.locale_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."

traits.locale_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “是基因窃取者。它们拥有非同寻常的渗透能力，拥有极高的适应性、组织性与智力水平。我们曾见过其他物种个体遭到这种生物的感染，被感染的宿主基因结构随后也发生了重组。”
languages.original_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."

traits.locale_text: “是基因窃取者。它们拥有非同寻常的渗透能力，拥有极高的适应性、组织性与智力水平。我们曾见过其他物种个体遭到这种生物的感染，被感染的宿主基因结构随后也发生了重组。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Corporaptor Hominis. Cuentan con habilidades de infiltración excepcionales, una gran adaptabilidad, una capacidad de organización notable y un intelecto avanzado. Se han observado infectando como parásitos individuos de otras especies, lo que ha resultado en la reconfiguración de la estructura genética de sus huéspedes».
languages.original_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."

traits.locale_text: «Corporaptor Hominis. Cuentan con habilidades de infiltración excepcionales, una gran adaptabilidad, una capacidad de organización notable y un intelecto avanzado. Se han observado infectando como parásitos individuos de otras especies, lo que ha resultado en la reconfiguración de la estructura genética de sus huéspedes».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Corporaptor Hominis. Sie verfügen über außergewöhnliche Infiltrationsfähigkeiten, sind anpassungsfähig, ausgesprochen organisiert und haben einen überragenden Intellekt. Bekannt für den parasitären Befall anderer Spezies und eine damit verbundene Rekonfiguration der Genstruktur des Wirtes."
languages.original_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."

traits.locale_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. Sie verfügen über außergewöhnliche Infiltrationsfähigkeiten, sind anpassungsfähig, ausgesprochen organisiert und haben einen überragenden Intellekt. Bekannt für den parasitären Befall anderer Spezies und eine damit verbundene Rekonfiguration der Genstruktur des Wirtes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « De Corporaptor Hominis. Ce sont de véritables maîtres de l'infiltration, capables de s'adapter à toute situation. Ils sont très organisés et dotés d'une intelligence avancée. Des rapports font état d'infections parasitaires d'autres espèces, ayant entraîné une reconfiguration de la structure génétique de leur hôte. »
languages.original_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."

traits.locale_text: « De Corporaptor Hominis. Ce sont de véritables maîtres de l'infiltration, capables de s'adapter à toute situation. Ils sont très organisés et dotés d'une intelligence avancée. Des rapports font état d'infections parasitaires d'autres espèces, ayant entraîné une reconfiguration de la structure génétique de leur hôte. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「コーポラプトル・ホミニス。優れた潜入能力を持ち、順応力に長け、非常によくまとめあげられていて、知性も進歩している。他の種への寄生感染で確認されて、その後宿主の遺伝子構造を作り変えてしまうのだ」
languages.original_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."

traits.locale_text: 「コーポラプトル・ホミニス。優れた潜入能力を持ち、順応力に長け、非常によくまとめあげられていて、知性も進歩している。他の種への寄生感染で確認されて、その後宿主の遺伝子構造を作り変えてしまうのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Corporaptor Hominis. Muazzam sızma kabiliyetine sahiptirler, her koşula adapte olabilirler, son derece organize olup gelişmiş bir zekâya sahiptirler. Diğer türlerde parazit enfeksiyonuna neden oldukları ve sonrasında da konaklarının genetik yapısını yeniden düzenledikleri gözlemlenmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Corporaptor Hominis. They possess exceptional infiltration capabilities, they are adaptive, highly organised, and their intellects are advanced. Observed in parasitic infection of individuals of other species with subsequent reconfiguration of the host's genetic structure."
